info.title: Hub Space Api Documentation
info.description: Welcome to Hub Space api documentation. This document is including information and description for integrating with your Hub Space api.

200.description: deletes a single record based on the ID supplied

post.description: Get total redeem success amount time series area chart.

requestBody.description: You can filter chart data by date time range and array of coupon id. Please note that if you provide empty array as an array of coupon id, it means you need chart data for all coupon.

post.description: Get total redeem success amount for new customer and return customer as pie chart.
Get total redeem success amount for each utm source as pie chart.

Get total cart amount and total discount amount(calculated by cart amount - discount value or cart amount - (cart amount * discount value/100) in order of discount type is percentage) as time series line chart.
Create a company and associating user who created that company as a company team member.

Because the HubSpace APIs require companyId for getting resource. This endpoint makes your access token to include a companyId. So the HubSpace APIs can check your companyId in your access token when you are making a request automatically. Please note, you have to get new access token after called this endpoint.

get.description: Get coupon session by coupon id.

post.description: Create a new coupon redemption session.
Cancel coupon session and release reserved coupon.

200.description: deletes a single record based on the ID supplied
deletes a single record based on the ID supplied
deletes a single record based on the ID supplied

get.description: Get your user profile by identifying email which is embeded in your access token. If user profile not found, this endpoint will create your user profile automatically base on information in your access token.

name.description: Name of a new api key

number_of_employees.description:
Number of your employee
0 is 1 - 4,
1 is 5-9,
2 is 10-49,
3 is 50-199,
4 is 200-499,
5 is 500-999,
6 is +1000 Employee

industry.description:
Industry of your company
    0 is SaaS,
    1 is is E-Commerce,
    2 is Retail,
    3 is Banking,
    4 is Insurance,
    5 is Food Delivery,
    6 is Transport,
    7 is Services,
    8 is Education,
    9 is Publisher,
    10 is Health & Fitness,
    11 is Fashion,
    12 is Restaurant,
    13 is Telecommunication

role.description: Your position in this company such as CEO, CMO, Marketer, Developer

discount_type.description: Type of discount. 0 is percentage and 1 is fixed amount.

discount_value.description:
Discount value. For example if you want to create coupon discount 30%. You can set discount_type is 0 and discount value is 30.

Otherwise, if you want to create coupon discount 500 (usd,sgd,thb,etc.), you can set discount_type is 1 and discount value is 500.

redemption_limit_per_campaign.description:
Total amount of time coupon can be redeemed. If you set 100, your customers can redeem this coupon not more than 100 times.

Default value is -1 which means unlimited.

limit_to_customers.description: Specific customer can redeem this coupon.

limit_to_products.description: This coupon can be redeemed if customer's cart is including product in limit_to_products.

status.description:
Status of coupon
0 is draft,
1 is active,
2 is ended,
3 is pause,
4 is ended

is_eligible_for_first_time_transaction.description: If true, this coupon can be redeemed by new customer only.

start_at.description: Coupon will be redeemable after start_at date time

first_name.description: First name of a new customer

last_name.description: Last name of a new customer

sku.description: A product code that you can use to search and identify stock in both of Hub Space and your database.
